MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML5 postcode area of Coatbridge. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.40pm to safely carry out repair work to a damaged underground cable on Drumpellier Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.24pm on the 6th of February 2021.
